desc: Lumina Silky Skin offers the most sought-after premium IPL hair removal handset. The only perfect alternative to shaving, waxing and expensive clinical laser treatment. Say good-bye to hassle and get hair-free skin in days. The IPL treatment also gives you rejuvenated skin and helps remove wrinkles and acne.

layout.text:
IPL Skin Treatment Helps Reduce Wrinkles and
Close Enlarged Pores.
